name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-meetings-attendance-report-csharp
title: Bot sent meeting attendance report in chat.
shortDescription: This sample application demonstrates how to retrieve meeting attendance reports using the Graph API and send them through a bot in the meeting chat.
longDescription: This sample application allows users to fetch meeting attendance reports using the Graph API and automatically sends these reports via a bot when the meeting ends. It includes features such as bot interaction and seamless integration with Microsoft Teams for enhanced productivity.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing meeting attendance report in chat csharp

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
